pullrequest.title: Remove all RPATH references that points to default lib installation (->default)

content.raw: For context, the `USE_FULL_RPATH` variable was used by ROS in order to locate the gazebo libraries that were installed in `/opt/ros`. We should be fine now that ROS uses the system install of Gazebo.
content.html: For context, the USE_FULL_RPATH variable was used by ROS in order to locate the gazebo libraries that were installed in /opt/ros. We should be fine now that ROS uses the system install of Gazebo.
